1k eh, she's right, woman might say they prefer average or "slightly" above average, but that's really because they're in the presence of other people / researchers. There's a stigma around woman liking big dicks and even though the people that ask her are strangers, they don't want to be judged badly(size queen slut or the likes), even though that might not happen, thus they pick the safe option (~5-6 inches EL). Furthermore, there hasn't been a study that correlates the range of sizes of dicks woman have been with, and the corresponding pleasure / satisfaction they received. There's a higher likelihood for a woman to be with an average male(s), thus when she is asked what her ideal size is, she does not have anything to compare it with, therefore picking the average or slightly above it. Dildos are dicks but not dicks of living breathing humans (hopefully), it is treated differently from a dick of a sex partner, thus not influencing her choice, regarding said subject, as much.

If you took a hypothetical situation in which 1 male with a range of different cock sizes pleasures the woman across multiple parallel time lines, with all the variables such as foreplay, knowing how to use it etc. remaining the same, she'd definitely choose the dick, standard deviation(s) above the average, yes she might not choose the 9-10 incher but that obviously isn't the point I'm making. Concluding, AVERAGE woman always prefer greater size (~2 inches EL and ~1.25 EG on top of what they say). She's a brave woman for saying the truth. Most of the time, like our queen said, he wont be able to get married / will stay a virgin and his genes will just be erased from the gene pool. He'll just be another cast away anomaly that got the "few standard deviations to the left" treatment.
